_explanation.purpose: Shape phase - defines the story graph hierarchy structure (epics, sub_epics, story_groups, stories)
_explanation.structure: Hierarchical tree: epics contain sub_epics, sub_epics contain story_groups, story_groups contain stories
_explanation.scope: ONLY defines hierarchy and ordering. Does NOT add users, scenarios, steps, or acceptance criteria (those come in later phases)
_explanation.fields: sequential_order determines display order, connector defines logical relationship (and/or), story_type identifies the kind of story
